Yes TF is greedy, it takes all GPU memory by default

body:
Yes TF is greedy, it takes all GPU memory by default

On Feb 11, 2017 6:23 PM, "Mandar Upadhye" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> thanks @yaroslavvb <https://github.com/yaroslavvb> ! jupyter notebook
> locked in full memory even when it was idle!
>
> —
